types.html:
vadimien (feminine vadimienne, masculine plural vadimiens, feminine plural vadimiennes)

  1. (relational) of Roger Vadim Plemiannikov (1928–2000), French screenwriter, film director and producer, known for visually lavish films with erotic qualities
trans: of Roger Vadim Plemiannikov , French screenwriter, film director and producer, known for visually lavish films with erotic qualities
